11113112.content:
After arriving Hinata placed Naruto on her bed, she opened her mouth to talk when she was interrupted by a growl.
She blushed, and said "Sorry, I'm hungry."
At this Naruto's stomach growled as well.
"Me too." Naruto yelled up to Hinata.
"Alright, wait here. I'll go get some food." Hinata said as she left the room.
A few minutes later she returned with two giant (to Naruto) bowls of Ramen that she put on the bed.
"RAMEN YES!!!" Naruto cried before running to the first bowl.
"Wait." Hinata said, as she did some handsigns before saying "Shrunken Protection jutsu!"
This caused Naruto to glow blue.
"There." Hinata said. "Being tiny can be dangerous, that jutsu will protect you from dying, or being hurt, by anything other then a direct hit by a flying kunai. It also lets me hear you as long as you are withing 10 feet of me as the caster. Though that takes an hour to work, due to it being a side effect."
"Thanks Hinata." Naruto said.
"Your welcome Naruto-kun." Hinata said looking down to the ramen bowls. "Though be warned that is how some of my family kill bugs for target practise, so be careful."
"Alright thanks." Naruto said as Hinata got up.
"Your welcome Naruto-kun." Hinata said, leaving. "I'm going to get some chopsticks for me to eat. Your bowl of Ramen is on the left."
"Got it." Naruto called. "Now RAMEN!!!"
With that he jumped in the nearest bowl of ramen, however he did not check, so did he get his bowl of ramen, or Hinata's bowl?
